title: Ticking Time Bombs
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: NFL vaccine detractors, Deshaun back in camp and more!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones discusses the remaining vaccine detractors across the NFL in the context of the league’s ruling on forfeited games and salaries due to COVID breakouts, as well as the Texans treating QB Deshaun Watson like the allegations of sexual misconduct against him “never happened” (21:45). Plus, an IYHH including Jeff Bezos’ trip to space (31:09) and your voicemails from when your partner ditched you for a future pro (48:47)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @cademetz asks the question, can A.I. grade your next test?: https://nyti.ms/3BN63iK
  2. @julianzelizer shares that Texas has “declared war on history”: https://cnn.it/3rALBwA
  3. @alinaselyukh on former Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos’ space flight and cringeworthy comments on who paid for it: https://n.pr/3zB8Jhm
